project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Messages appear in correct chronological order across all devices
Unread messages are clearly indicated to the user
System supports group chats with at least 50 participants
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Allow users to initiate and participate in one-to-one and group video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start and receive video calls from their contact list
Video and audio streams have less than 300ms latency under normal conditions
Support for at least 4 participants in a group video call
Call quality automatically adjusts based on network conditions
non_functional: Video resolution up to 720p with adaptive bitrate
End-to-end encryption for video and audio streams

notes: Assumed the requirement includes both one-to-one and group communication for text and video. No details provided on platforms (web, mobile) or authentication, so dependencies include authentication and communication infrastructure.
